"Tasks":
"You are now able to accept and complete Tasks.
Tasks can be assigned through story progression or accepted from NPCs. Completing them may progress the story, or give other rewards.

There are various different types of Tasks, such as Main Tasks, which progress the story, and Daily Tasks, which are replaced every day whether you complete them or not."

"You can check your assigned and completed Tasks by selecting \"Tasks/Quest\" from the main menu.

You can select a Task from this list to display a Guide for it on-screen, showing the Task's intended location and your progress towards completing it."
